name: Frankenstein 2000
description: Frankenstein 2000 is an action game. The player controls a small machine, and travels in Frankenstein's body. The body is divided in several organs - for example the brain, stomach, lungs, etc. Each organ is a small maze, where player avoids obstacles and activates special devices. Sometimes, travel between organs looks like a simple shoot'em up, where the player shootsupe various objects. He must be careful to pay attention to 2 "bars" - damage and oxygen.
alsoFor: BBC Micro, ZX Spectrum | Combined View
